subject: QORNIX password change request
message:
Hi Ahmad Shafiq,
This is to confirm that we have received a Forgot Password request for your Account Username - ahmadshofiq3@gmail.com
From the IP Address - 209.222.97.206
Click this linke to reset your password-
http://qornix.com/fastlane/?ng=login/pwreset-validate/4/token_3220772065
Please note: until your password has been changed, your current password will remain valid. The Forgot Password Link will be available for a limited time only.
Best Regards,
QORNIX Team
